Html:
This seems an old problem and I see that you have talked about it in ISSUES, but it seems that the problem has not been solved.
Still have this problem... I am working on VS2013 Premium and CSD 2.0.1.7...

If I put my section inside a Group I receive null when I try to execute following line
Configs.MySettingsSection.Instance //<- Instance is null;
If I remove group everything works...

Here how I have tried:
<sectionGroup name="mySectionGroup " type="Configs.MediaCommunications">
      <section name="settings" type="Configs.Settings, Website" allowLocation="true" allowDefinition="Everywhere" />
    </sectionGroup>
or in this way:
<sectionGroup name="mySectionGroup "  type="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup, System.Configuration, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a">
      <section name="settings" type="Configs.Settings, Website" allowLocation="true" allowDefinition="Everywhere" />
    </sectionGroup>
Can you help me please?
